ComicInfo.Penciller: Art Saaf,George Tuska,Jerry Grandenetti,Lee Elias,Nick Cardy,Howard Sherman,Sheldon Moldoff,Lee Elias,George Tuska,Howard Sherman,Art Saaf,Sheldon Moldoff,Jerry Grandenetti
ComicInfo.Summary:
An Incident of Violence: Frank tries to kill his girlfriend's father so they can inherit his old mill.
Don't Let Me Die!: Jack returns from an icy grave to get revenge on his killer.
The Curse of the Kung Lo Diamond: A cursed diamond is cut up into smaller diamonds and appears to be spreading the curse all over town.
Die a Deep Death!: Manuel robs the mine's payroll so he can spend it on Dolores but a cave-in reveals his crime.
The Exile from Earth: Kirk Randall uses an ancient Egyptian ring, which makes him invulnerable as long as he doesn't touch the ground, to commit a string of robberies.
Please -- Kill Me Once More: During a near-death experience Mr. Cronin meets a robber who gives him a clue to where his loot is hidden.
ComicInfo.Title: An Incident of Violence; Don't Let Me Die!; The Curse of the Kung Lo Diamond; Die a Deep Death!; The Exile from Earth; Please -- Kill Me Once More
